import './company-update-coupon.css' import history from '../../../../../../history' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' import { getToday } from './../../../../../../../../utils/dateUtil' export default function CompanyUpdateCoupon(props) { let valid = true let currentRef if (!props.couponsRef.current[0].current) { valid = false history.push("/company/my-coupons") } else currentRef = props.couponsRef.current[0].current const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/company/my-coupons') } const handleSubmit = (values) => { //TODO manage coupon submit here //TODO change date format if needed console.log(values)//TODO delete history.push('/company/my-coupons') setTimeout(() => { alert('success') }, (0)) } const getBody = () => { if (valid) return ( <>
Update An Existing Coupon
{({ values }) => (
{/* ------------------------------From:------------------------------ */} {/* ------------------------------To:------------------------------ */}
From: To:
Title
Description
Category
Image URL
Price
$
Amount
From:
To:
Date
Price
$
From:
To:
)}
) else return (<>) } return ( <> {getBody()} ) }
